title: Pilfering the Vaults of 90s Sample CDs
description:
I love old sample libraries. Let me show you how to get them for yourselves, for free!
https://archive.org/details/samplecds

Here's a great tutorial on how to use Audacity (free) to do the splitting: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Fu2HecbtqPk

Join Patreon and get access to music, presets, samples, and a great community.
